verbs.description: A photo of [ARG1: a toddler who] [V: appears] [C-ARG1: to be in a cage] is being shared by people who say it 's a picture of a child separated at the border under the Trump administration 's new policy . People are furious that he appears to be caged like a dog . Was that fake ? Well , it 's a real photo , but it is not from the Trump administration era . This photo is from years ago , during a demonstration in Dallas . Some of the people who posted it as criticism of the Trump administration are saying they stand by their choice to share it , saying it illustrated what the president is supporting .
